titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material for: Satisficing Mentalizing: Bayesian Theory of Mind Reasoning in Scenarios with varying Uncertainty

mods.abstract: This data publication contains supplementary material such as the code, data and additional results for the paper "Satisficing Mentalizing: Bayesian Theory-of-Mind Reasoning in Scenarios with varying Uncertainty" by Pöppel & Kopp 2019. This supplementary material is an extension of an earlier version (published at http://doi.org/10.4119/unibi/2918529) for an earlier version of the paper.
